text: "Pimp Juice" is a rap/R&B;/g-funk song by American rapper Nelly. It was the sixth and final single from his second album Nellyville. The song was released on April 1, 2003. The song reached number 58 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100, 27 on the U.S. Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks and 11 on the U.S. Billboard Hot Rap Tracks. ==References== Category:Nelly songs Category:2003 songs
title: Pimp Juice
